addr: 515 Malcolm X Boulevard New York, NY 10037-1801
title: First Fridays: Black Tie "Holiday" Edition
desc: The Schomburg Center is proud to present our Holiday " Black Tie Edition ? of First?Fridays, our popular monthly social gathering. In celebration of the Schomburg?s 90th anniversary, this event will pay tribute to our rich history and vast collection that is accessed across the world. Celebrate our 90 th  anniversary at this special cocktail affair with light hors d?oeurves from an award-winning restaurant and a complimentary glass of wine, Khalil Gibran Muhammad, the Director of the Schomburg Center, will also provide opening remarks for the evening. Groove the night away with beats by DJ Sylk, and don?t miss the evening?s host Dhalimu from Dhali's Closet. We?ll also have a special musical performance from Acute Inflections, signature drinks and extended viewing hours in our galleries. Explore our current exhibitions,? The 75 th ?Anniversary of the American Negro Theatre ,  Unveiling Visions: The Alchemy of the Black Imagination ? and? Black Suburbia: From Levittown to Ferguson . ????????????????????????????????????????????????????? Suggested dress code is cocktail chic! See you there! #FirstFridays #Schomburg90 Suggested donations are welcome.? Tickets are non-refundable and go towards donations for the Schomburg .
